overview:
Brett Safron joined Cision in May 2001. As SVP of Global Product Management, Brett has overall responsibility for the definition and advancement of Cision’s products and services including CisionPoint, the CODiE award-winning workflow application for Cision.

Brett joined Cision from HALO Branded Solutions/Starbelly.com, a promotional products start-up where he was the director of product development. Starbelly was ultimately acquired by the world’s largest promotional products firm. Prior to Starbelly, Brett was a senior consultant for Whittman-Hart, where he led a number of projects to develop e-commerce, Internet and business applications - all utilizing Web technologies. Brett has a BS in computer information systems and accounting from Indiana University, is a CPA and is a PMI-certified project manager.
